data.why:
I wish to contribute Time::ProseClock -- an alternative to
    conventional digital and analog time displays. Instantiate the
    object and print $obj->display() to show the time as as a typical
    colloquial English expression. An optional argument to the display
    method can show a user-defined time instead of default localtime().
    Please read the POD for more detail.

    Thank you,

    Gerald Gold
